data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
File::RsyncP is a native perl implementation of rsync that can talk
    to the standard rsync program.

    An existing module by another author, File::Rsync, is a
    wrapper/helper script for running rsync.

    I picked "RsyncP" to mean "Rsync perl". Certainly, File::Rsync
    would have been the better name for this package, but that is taken.
